official_title: A bill to provide for an easement for a natural gas pipeline through the Big Thicket National Preserve in the State of Texas.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to grant an easement through the Big Thicket National Preserve, Texas, for a natural gas pipeline.
